name: Catptain Kitten's Fishing Trip
description:
Oh no! the dastardly Catptain Kitten has abducted you to serve on their ship! You'd have refused, but how could you possibly say no to that cute face? Prove your devotion by collecting all 100 fish from the waters of Isle Fishland, and earn the title of master sailor!

use A and D to move your rudder and the left and right arrow keys to move your sail!
